DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore effect CP-690,550 ( Tofacitinib ) measure kidney function patient active rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Effect Of CP-690,550 On Measures Of Kidney Function In Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: The patient must meet American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) classification criterion diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis satisfy least four seven criterion . The patient must active disease Screening predose Day 1 Period 1 . Patient must inadequate response least one diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARD ) , nonbiologic biologic , due ineffectiveness intolerance . Pregnant lactate woman Serious medical condition would make treatment CP690,550 potentially unsafe . A patient history asthma , multiple allergy severe allergy ( eg , anaphylaxis ) substance . In particular , history allergy iodine , povidoneiodine , iohexol iodinate contrast medium .
